name: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings Enhanced Edition
notes: Important: You must supply the exe and bin files yourself. Download: The Witcher 2: Assassins Of Kings - Enhanced Edition (Part 1 of 6) The Witcher 2: Assassins Of Kings - Enhanced Edition (Part 2 of 6) The Witcher 2: Assassins Of Kings - Enhanced Edition (Part 3 of 6) The Witcher 2: Assassins Of Kings - Enhanced Edition (Part 4 of 6) The Witcher 2: Assassins Of Kings - Enhanced Edition (Part 5 of 6) The Witcher 2: Assassins Of Kings - Enhanced Edition (Part 6 of 6)

files.setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file from GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher 2/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_36
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_39
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Witcher 2
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: '1'
